summary: Provides a centralized configuration dataclass and a suite of reusable utilities for setting up and managing Feast feature repository integration tests, including environment handling, permission server simulation, and factories for common data sources, entities, feature views, and test datasets across various store backends.
business_intent: Enable developers to efficiently configure and execute integration tests for Feast feature repositories by offering a unified configuration hub and reusable test environment components, ensuring consistency and reducing setup effort across different offline and online store implementations.
